high_descs: Turn right and walk towards the stove
Take a pot from the stove
Turn back and take few steps and enter into the left side room and walk towards the table lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine the pot by the light of a lamp

high_descs: pick up the pot from the stove
walk and reach the desklamp along with the pot
anns.task_desc: pick up the pot from the stove and turn on the desklamp

high_descs: Head rotate and turn left to the sink.
Pick the pot near the sink.
Turn left and turn right to the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pot by the light of the desk lamp.
